name: Clear The Clearing
description:
A desperate fight against the odds to keep you little clearing free from intruders. This is a small game and all you have to do is survive 30 rounds to win!

Controls:
  • Use W, A, S and D to move
  • Use the MOUSE to pick up and place towers
  • Use SPACE to pause
Credits:

This game was made using free assets from the following createts:

  • Art: Analog Studios
  • Music & SFX: Kronbits
  • Font 'Silver' : Poppy Works

This game was playtested by Flar & Fatfeather
